General.Name: STO Express Co Ltd
General.Description: STO Express Co.,Ltd provides express delivery services in China and internationally. It offers express services; value-added services, such as payment collection, pre-sale sinking, and other products; and express accessories, including envelopes, file bags, cartons, and other express packages, as well as warehouse and distribution integration, e-commerce, C2M, and grid warehouses services. STO Express Co.,Ltd was founded in 1993 and is based in Shanghai, China.
